comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Railroad man, president of the Jersey Central.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: On May 1, 1914, at a meeting of the board of directors, Besler was named both President and General Manager of the Jersey Central Railroad. "Besler to Head Jersey Central" ----- Announcement in The New York Times, May 2, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E0DE1D9153AE7...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_George_Besler

comment._content:
